post:
Tired of poor quality of service from The Other Guys? Come to IPXcore! We have great service and great true 24/7 support; you'll love us!

**Some company info:**
We've been up and running since May of 2011. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro -powered hardware.
Each server node has it's own 100mbit connection. 
Past-30-days support ticket mean response time:  0 Day(s) 0 Hour(s) 19 Minute(s) and 51 Second(s)

**_The Offer:_**
Coupon code 15%recurringvirtualserver - 15% off any Premium VPS ( https://ipxcore.com/premium-vps/ ) plan!

IronVPS
192mb RAM
32mb vSwap
15gb RAID10 disk
300gb monthly transfer
2 CPU cores
1 IPv4
-$2.49/month-
**_$2.11/month_** with coupon code **15%recurringvirtualserver**
https://ipxcore.com/order/cart.php?a=add&pid=5&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3

https://ipxcore.com/order/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3

This discount is available with our SilverVPS and GoldVPS plans on our website.

**_FYI: As outlined in the AUP/TOS ( http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ ), all new registrations MUST be made with verifiable postal address information._** Repeating your province/state in the address fields will cause your account to be suspended til you update your account information. These plans are auto-verified with Maxmind; if you get auto-tagged for fraud, open a support ticket for resolution. All plans are also subject to manual verifications. Please note that mismatched payment/account information is cause for suspension til manual verification is complete!

You are encouraged to exercise the 3-day trial period (outlined in http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ in the Billing section ) and determine if this service will be right for you.

Test IP: 198.144.190.10
Looking glass with test files: http://carbon.ipxcore.com/lg/

We also do custom plans. Please contact us with your requirements.
